thread.title_full: BluePrint Healthcare IT Launches Digital Health Package for Pediatric Hospitals

author: Pamela Macey
title: BluePrint Healthcare IT Launches Digital Health Package for Pediatric Hospitals
text:
BluePrint Healthcare IT launched a program to help pediatric hospitals and health systems prove the value of engaging families and care teams through mobile health software. The program offers two packages, based on the company’s award-winning platform, Care Navigator™. Care Navigator: Engage and Care Navigator: Activate each offer specific features – like secure texting, video conferencing, photo sharing, knowledge assessments and multimedia education – in a 90- or 180-day program. “Pediatric hospitals serve a special mission to provide highly personalized care to each of their children and families. In today’s environment, this means finding new and innovative ways of creating connected relationships that are seamless regardless of the setting in which care is provided. They are looking to mobile health tools to help them engage families especially when serving the needs of an ever-increasing population of medically complex children whose parents and caregivers face significant challenges on a daily basis. These two Care Navigator™ packages lets them prove the value of mhealth for their families in as little as 90 days,” said Vikas Khosla, BluePrint Healthcare IT President & CEO.
The largest pediatric rehabilitation hospital in the United States, Children’s Specialized Hospital of New Jersey, along with BluePrint Healthcare IT, received the Microsoft Health Innovation Award in the Patient Engagement category at HIMSS15 in April, 2015. This honor reflected the power of personalized care coordination and mobile communication tools for pediatric organizations. Christopher Haines, DO, Chief Medical Officer, Children’s Specialized Hospital stated after receiving the award, “The work that we are doing together, through their Care Navigator™ platform and our PCMH, is another crucial step in our efforts to provide the most efficient and effective care for our patients – who make up some of the most medically complex children in the region – as well as their parents and family caregivers.”
Care Navigator: Engage will offer features focused on HIPAA-compliant patient, caregiver and care team communication:
 Secure Texting Video conferencing Photo and Document Sharing One-touch Care Team Directory
Care Navigator: Activate will offer features focused on assessing patient and caregiver needs and satisfaction while providing personalized education and community resources.
 Satisfaction Surveys Knowledge and Quality of Life Assessments Personalized Multi-Media Education Community Resources Directory
Learn more at http://www.BluePrintHIT.com or http://www.MyCareNav.com . Follow us on Twitter @blueprinthit or @mycarenav.
About BluePrint Healthcare IT
BluePrint Healthcare IT helps healthcare organizations create secure, connected communities of care. Through its software platforms, security and healthcare transformation services, BluePrint supports health systems, health plans, providers and regional health initiatives in achieving the Triple Aim. A Microsoft Managed Partner since 2014, BluePrint's flagship software platform is Care Navigator™, which enables real-time, team-based care coordination, communication and engagement.
